meaningMnemonic: There's a <radical>scooter</radical> coming toward you with a <radical>net</radical> trapping a weird <radical>zombie</radical> on it. You don't want this here, so you decide to <kanji>send back</kanji> the zombie. (It's a weird zombie because it has the ground on top of its head instead of dirt!)
readingMnemonic: As you prepare to <kanji>send back</kanji> the zombie, you imagine yourself as Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (かん). On your horse (it's just your own scooter) you stab forward with your spear (stick), swing the scooter the zombie is on, and send it back from whence it came!
